A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: The fact that anyone would hand such a sacred franchise to a hack that's more interested in serving themselves and making their own mark on the franchise is ludicrous. This movie upends a chunk of my childhood in a couple of hours. You can't just change the whole dynamic of characters\, make them behave completely abnormally\, and pretend you're a creative genius. I'd rather watch the holiday special.
